EmailTemplate.name: 202007_Americas_CH_Duncan_LASEREFIV_Webinar.1.Invite Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date - Navigating through LASEREF II/III Obsolescence Webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Navigating through LASEREF II/III Obsolescence! Join Duncan Aviation avionics experts, John Spellmeyer and Michael Kussatz, with special participation of Honeywell’s Technical Sales Manager, Ed Borger, for the upcoming Straight Talk webinar: Navigating through LASEREF II/III Obsolescence.
This webinar will present the reasons why you should upgrade to LASEREF IV and how to avoid unexpected downtime and costs.
After attending this webinar, you'll be well-versed on the upgrade options and incentives available for operators of aging aircraft. PLEASE REGISTER HERE <[[https://event.webinarjam.com/register/85/7vm05ak6]]>
